duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop a vision and implementation strategies for local and regional groups; communicate these across region.
Lead and oversee key pursuits, manage and grow key client relationships.
Drive the use of innovative technology within the markets served by VHB core service groups in the region.
Manage high-profile projects of various size and complexity.
Represent VHB at regional conferences, seminars, and industry events.
Develop or oversee training programs that positions VHB to be forward thinking on data and technology initiatives.

education_certification.credential: BS in Computer Science or related discipline (Master's preferred)
